column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday April 14 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Robert R Martin Bypass in Richmond/Madison Co:
column4: All eastbound lanes between Old Wilderness Trail and Transport Dr are shutdown until further notice due to a serious collision.

column3: Robert R Martin Bypass in Richmond/Madison Co:
column4: Traffic detoured to Old Wilderness Trail/3rd St toward downtown Richmond.
